name: Scilab Script
summary: Learn about .SCE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can create the SCE file with the Scilab editor. You can use the exec function in the Scilab console to execute the commands in the file. The SCE and .SCI files are both used by Scilab to contain multiple commands that are to be executed. The SCI file contains Scilab functions while the SCE file contains Scilab functions along with executable statements.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
